1.content:
Jack had just finished up his final class of the day, Physics, and was heading down the hall to his U.S History class, where he needed to finish up some extra work. He was surprised to find that the class was nearly half full, with normal days often only seeing three or four other people in there with him. Regardless, he took his seat and got out his work to do. While he was digging around in his backpack, though, Jack noticed the shrink ray he had bought not too long ago which he had not tested out yet. Looking around, he noticed all the other students were either on their phones or doing work, regardless, not paying attention.

Deciding that this would be an opportune time to try this machine out, Jack stealthily brought it out and set it on the table. He looked over the size options on the side which read: "Regular Size" "1/3 size" and "1/10 size". Mulling over his options, Jack decided the "1/10 size" would be the best for him to be able to sneak around the class and tus set the machine to that setting. Before pulling pressing the button to initiate the shrink ray, Jack took one final look around the classroom to make sure no one would notice. Confirming everyone was oblivious, Jack then proceeded and he was reduced down to a few inches in stature, remaining on his chair.

Excited that his plan worked, Jack first shimmied down his chair leg to the floor and thought of the first thing he should do. Most of the people in the classroom Jack didn't recognize, so it may not be too wise approaching them, but he did know a few. Two of his closer friends, Brigette and Mariah were off in separate corners of the room, appearing to be focused on their work. Trish, the lead cheerleader, was in the back of the room on her phone with a couple of her friends. The final person Jack knew in here was Lauren, the student body president. She was definitely a little uptight, always organized and somewhat of a pain in the butt, ordering people to live up to school standards. Additionally, though, Jack had the option of leaving the room and exploring the halls or go outside.

What does Jack do?

All of the girls were on their phones, not paying attention to anything going on other than themselves and their chatting with each other. Jack looked up and saw Trish, who was obviously enormous, but her features seemed accentuated by her tightly worn clothing and her massive size. So, Jack patiently waited for Trish to come to a stop and she eventually did just prior to the school's exit, right outside the girls' bathroom. A few of her friends went in, but Trish waited outside and pulled out her phone. Jack seized this momentary pause in movement and resumed ascending the giant girl. "What the hell? Is that some sort of bug?" Trish questioned. She took a few moments to focus on whatever the thing was before considering the possibility that it was a human. When Trish came to this realization, she gasped. "Are you real? Are you a person?" she uttered. Jack sighed and decided to tell her the truth.

"Yes, I am. It's Jack, from third block. I bet you're wondering how I got this small in the first place". A sly grin came over Trish's face. "Mmm, I'm not so curious about that, little guy. I am curious, though, what you think about these?" she gave Jack a glimpse of her titanic cleavage. Jack gulped. "W-well it certainly is something" he managed to utter. Trish rolled her eyes. 15.content:
None of what was going on in the room particularly interested Jack, so he decided to exit the classroom and explore a little. All the people around him were too distracted with what they had in front of them to notice Jack, so he made it out without an issue. Now in the halls, there were a lot of options for Jack. Before he did anything, though, Jack looked over his surroundings.

To his right was another classroom, although the door was closed. Standing outside of it were two girls, both unfamiliar to Jack, who were dressed in sporty clothing and rather tall, especially so since Jack was so small. To his left, Jack saw the entrance to the commons, where he assumed there would be more than a few kids just hanging out. Straight ahead, the hall leading to the stairs to go up was pretty empty, although there were a few students scattered about, including Jack's sister Izzy. Jack paused for a little while longer, unsure of what to do. Eventually, though, he decided to go straight and travel down the hallway.

Jack was surprisingly able to get down the hallway quite far, with not much movement from other people around him. This was interrupted, though, when a figure came close to Jack. It was Nira, one of the preppy girls. She was a total brat, always complaining about one thing or another and trying to take things that weren't hers. Jack made it to the edge of a few lockers, but froze when Nira came over to his area. Her sandals nearly touched Jack as Nira reached above and opened what was presumably her locker to grab or put something away. Knowing better than to somehow get her attention, Jack remained completely still and made very little noise. For a few moments, Jack was unsure about whether or not Nira had realized he was there. But, to his pleasure, Nira soon closed her locker and began walking away.

Jack, breathing a sigh of relief, then continued along his walk of the hallway when as he neared his sister, Izzy, someone picked him up. He turned around, struggling to break free of whoever's grasp it was, and saw the sharp brown eyes of a girl who Jack assumed was a freshman. "I don't have any pockets" she said quietly, almost as if it was to herself. The girl, ignoring Jack's pleas to let him go, threw him around and pulled back the waistband of her tights. She lowered her hand until it was just above the gap and let go of Jack. He fell for a brief moment before hitting the soft mound of the girl, then almost as soon as he did, felt a pressure behind him forcing him into her right cheek. Without saying another word, the girl then proceeded to briskly walk through the hallway.

Jack squirmed as best he could, trying to get loose, but to no avail. He was pinned too firmly against the girl's cheek and had no hope until the girl did something. She finally stopped after five or so minutes and Jack could hear the door to a classroom open and shut. Within another few moments, Jack was pressed even moreso into the girl's pale cheek as she sat down. The girl shifted her weight around on the chair, rolling Jack to and fro yet still keeping him in place. Once she got comfortable, the girl opened her tights and brought Jack out, placing him on her desk.

Jack: 18 years old, Jack is going through his senior year of high school. He is 5’10, athletically built, and has brown hair with blue eyes. Unbeknownst to his family, Jack has bought a functional shrink ray and plans on testing it at some point.

Carey: 47 years old, Carey is Jack’s mom. She sports brown hair and brown eyes and has remained in excellent shape, with healthy assets up front and from behind. Carey is very loving of her children and does an amazing job running the family without a father present.

Isabella (Izzy): 16 years old, Izzy is the middle child of the family and is in her sophomore year of high school. She very much resembles her mom with the same brown hair and brown eyes, but has physically developed earlier than anyone her age, catching the attention of many. A very cheeky sister, Izzy loves to mess around with Jack.

Lucy: 15 years old, Lucy is the youngest of the three children and is in her freshman year of high school. Oddly enough, she has black hair and blue eyes, contrasting her mother and sister. Unlike her sister, Lucy has not developed as significantly; however, is still nothing to overlook. She loves her family very much, especially her brother, and is very cautious.

Brigette: 17 years old, Brigette is one of Jack’s neighbors and close friends. She is also in her senior year of high school and shares a few classes with Jack. Brigette has long, blonde hair with blue eyes and a modest figure. They often go to and come from school together, considering they live so close.

Portia: 16 years old, Portia is another one of Jack’s neighbors. She is of Asian descent and has long, black hair with brown eyes. Portia is pretty shy around other people but likes to open up to Jack and go to and from school with him on occasion. Unbeknownst to Jack, she may have feelings for him.

Eiko: 14 years old, Eiko is a Japanese exchange student who is currently residing with Portia. She has medium long black hair and soft, brown eyes. In contrast to Portia, Eiko is very social and sports a very developed body. Because of her close proximity to Jack, Eiko has grown very fond of him and has on multiple occasions tried to get her alone with him.

Trish: 17 years old, Trish is the lead cheerleader at Tahoma High School and is very much one of the popular students. She has long, dirty blonde hair and brown eyes, with a smoking body to match. More often than not, she doesn’t pay too much attention to Jack and spends most of her time with her clique. On occasion, though, she does run into Jack and their interactions vary.

Mariah: 18 years old, Mariah is possibly Jack’s closest friend. She has a slightly bigger advantage in her front than the back, and sometimes likes to tease Jack about it. Mariah has medium brown hair with blue eyes and her and Jack share nearly every class together. Funny enough, both her and Jack have some feelings for the other, but neither have said anything.
